<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// used after vectorization, even when their operands are not poison. Those</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Remove dead recipes from \\p Plan.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vplantransforms/#aaca9dd97d4c523d8c65274654abe4eb9">removeDeadRecipes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> &amp;Plan);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Update \\p Plan to account for the uncountable early exit block in \\p</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// UncountableExitingBlock by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; updating the condition exiting the vector loop to include the early</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    exit conditions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  &#42; splitting the original middle block to branch to the early exit block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    if taken.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vplantransforms/#ac2fcd61c17c94d7e9d10b24b718c812e">handleUncountableEarlyExit</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> &amp;Plan, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;OrigLoop,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;UncountableExitingBlock,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vprecipebuilder">VPRecipeBuilder</a> &amp;RecipeBuilder);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Lower abstract recipes to concrete ones, that can be codegen&#39;d.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vplantransforms/#a63e564d621011fac5978d18138121e5c">convertToConcreteRecipes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> &amp;Plan);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If there&#39;s a single exit block, optimize its phi recipes that use exiting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// IV values by feeding them precomputed end values instead, possibly taken</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vplantransforms/#a3a573419fed83f23b6bf70ac6731dbfa">optimizeInductionExitUsers</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> &amp;Plan,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;VPValue &#42;, VPValue &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;EndValues);</span></CodeLine>
